text: Dina (dharma) cya sandarbhata kasalihi jorajabaradasti nahi. Satya, asatyapasuna alaga jhale, yastava jo manusya taguta (allahasivaya itara upasyam) na nakaruna ekameva allahavara imana rakhila, tara tyane motha majabuta adhara dharala, jo kadhihi tutanara nahi ani sarvasrestha allaha aikanara, jananara ahe
